page.title: 14WIVENHOE 70 YEARS AGO
page.content: { Mrs Allen:}Well the fish shop has been there a long while.Owned by the owners uncle called Mr Edwin Green.He owned it then on the corner of Alma Street where Mr Marsturn lived. Where the restaurant is now on the corner of West street the Bakehouse that was why it was called The Bakehouse that used to be a bakers and they used to bake their own fresh bread there.The ovens are there.If you go into the back of the bakehouse you can still see them because all the bread was cooked by coal and not by steam not like it is now.The shop where the paper shop is now they've always been there but there was a big fire severel years ago and it was all burnt down.
